source.sqlReaderQuery:
select x.Sourcetablename,x.Targetfilename,x.targetfoldername,x.Query_Full_CC from etl.x_Databricks_Logic_new x where EPIC_CC_Filters in ('Patient-Based') and Is_REQ=1  and IsActive=1
and avg_runtime_Full_mins is null

activities.name: ForEach1
activities.description: using Community connect logic for these table list. rest will use No CC logic until we update it in metadata table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select x.Sourcetablename,x.Targetfilename,x.targetfoldername,x.Query_Full_CC from etl.x_Databricks_Logic_new x where EPIC_CC_Filters in ('Patient-Based') and Is_REQ=1  and IsActive=1
and (avg_runtime_Full_mins is not null and avg_runtime_Full_mins <600)
order by avg_runtime_Full_mins

activities.name: ForEach1
activities.description: using Community connect logic for these table list. rest will use No CC logic until we update it in metadata table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select x.Sourcetablename,x.Targetfilename,x.targetfoldername,x.Query_Incremental_CDC_CC from etl.x_Databricks_Logic_new x 
left join (select distinct TABLE_NAME from dbo.CR_STAT_EXTRACT where INITIALIZE_TIME >=DATEADD(HOUR, 22, DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, 1, GETDATE()) , 0)) and FILE_SIZE_BYTES>0) c on c.TABLE_NAME=x.Sourcetablename 
left join (select distinct TABLE_NAME from dbo.CR_STAT_DERTBL where ckpt_init >=DATEADD(HOUR, 22, DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, 1, GETDATE()) , 0))) d on d.TABLE_NAME=x.Sourcetablename 
where EPIC_CC_Filters in ('Service Area Lookup') and Is_REQ=1  and IsActive=1 and (c.TABLE_NAME is not null or  d.TABLE_NAME is not null)

activities.name: ForEach1
activities.description: using Community connect logic for these table list. rest will use No CC logic until we update it in metadata table

source.sqlReaderQuery: select x.Sourcetablename,x.Targetfilename,x.targetfoldername,x.Query_Full_CC from etl.x_Databricks_Logic_new x where EPIC_CC_Filters in ('Service Area Lookup') and Is_REQ=1  and IsActive=1

activities.name: ForEach1
activities.description: using Community connect logic for these table list. rest will use No CC logic until we update it in metadata table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select x.Sourcetablename,x.Targetfilename,x.targetfoldername,x.Query_Full from etl.x_Databricks_Logic_new x
inner join (select distinct table_name from CR_STAT_EXTRACT where FILE_SIZE_BYTES>0 and INITIALIZE_TIME >=DATEADD(HOUR, 22, DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, 1, GETDATE()) , 0)))c on c.TABLE_NAME=x.Sourcetablename
where x.Is_ZC=1  and x.IsActive =1 and x.Is_ZC =1 and x.Exclude= 0and x.Is_Deprecated=0

select * from etl.x_Databricks_Logic_new where IsActive =1 and is_ZC =1
and exclude= 0 and Is_Deprecated=0

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT a.account_id,a.account_name,a.birthdate, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from dbo.account a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES dbo.account, @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) AS CT ON a.account_id = CT.account_id where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

properties.description: This pipeline will copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: ListObjectsFromOneGroup
activities.description: List objects from one group and iterate each of them to downstream activities

activities.name: RouteJobsBasedOnLoadingBehavior
activities.description: Check the loading behavior for each object if it requires full load or incremental load. If it is Default or FullLoad case, do full load. If it is DeltaLoad case, do incremental load.

activities.name: FullLoadOneObject
activities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

activities.name: GetMaxWatermarkValue
activities.description: Query the source object to get the max value from watermark column

activities.name: DeltaLoadOneObject
activities.description: Copy the changed data only from last time via comparing the value in watermark column to identify changes.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from [@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).schema}].[@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).table}] 
    where [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] > @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, 
    concat('''', json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, ''''))}
    and [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] <= @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, 
    concat('''', activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, ''''))}

defaultActivities.name: DefaultFullLoadOneObject
defaultActivities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

properties.description: Copy pipeline for Clarity OR_BAL_OVTM_T table.
Tables needed from the EBA database on ddcadifinprddb for SCM.
